data.title: Analgesic efficacy of virtual reality for acute pain in amniocentesis: A randomized controlled trial
data.meta_description: The VR intervention as a distractive technique emerged as effective in reducing pain during amniocentesis. It is easy to use, relatively inexpensive, has the advantage of no serious side effects, and may decrease the fear of pain that can affect patients' experiences and compliance with this procedu …
